# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="6318c-102">Ispis e-pošte, kalendara i privici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6318c-103">Da biste ispisali poruku e-pošte u programu Outlook na webu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-103">To print an email message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="6318c-104">Odaberite poruku koju želite ispisati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6318c-105">U gornjem desnom kutu poruke odaberite tri točkice i odaberite **Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6318c-106">Ispis kalendara:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6318c-107">U gornjem desnom kutu stranice odaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="6318c-108">**Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6318c-109">Odaberite raspon prikaz i vrijeme i odaberite **Ispis**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6318c-110">Da biste ispisali privitak:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6318c-111">Otvorite poruku koja sadrži privitak koji želite ispisati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="6318c-112">Pomaknite pokazivač iznad privitak i odaberite ikonu **Preuzimanje**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="6318c-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-113"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="6318c-114">Nakon što je preuzimanje datoteke otvorite s odgovarajući program i odaberite mogućnost za ispis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6318c-115">Na primjer, otvoriti .doc datoteku u programu Word i zatim ispisati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6318c-116">Da biste saznali više, pogledajte [Ispis poruke e-pošte, privitke, i kalendare u programu Outlook na webu](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6318c-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
